## Describe the bug

A clear description of what the bug is.

## Steps to reproduce

1. Open a note with...
2. Run command...
3. See error...

## Expected behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual behavior

What actually happened.

## Environment

- **OS**: (e.g. macOS 15, Windows 11, Ubuntu 24.04)
- **Obsidian version**: (e.g. 1.7.4)
- **Plugin version**: (e.g. 1.1.0)
- **Editor mode**: (Source / Live Preview / Reading)
